snippet: The Treasury Department told Congress it must act by Nov. 3 or the government will be dangerously close to being unable to pay all its bills
abstract: Treasury Dept tells Congress it must take action by Nov 3 or government will have less than $30 billion spending cushion to pay bills.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department told Congress it must act by Nov. 3 or the government will be dangerously close to being unable to pay all its bills

headline.print_headline: Treasury Dept. Issues Warning to Congress Against Inaction
headline.main: Treasury Dept. Issues Warning to Congress Against Inaction
